It now rushes madly through the dungeon, seeking to share its fate with others.}} ==Useful Info== '''Flaming corpses''' are literally [[fire|fiery]] undead cadavers rushing toward you to spread their flames. Their melee attacks inflict [[Sticky Flame]], and they run faster than the average character. They are fortunately rare, appearing most often in [[the Crypt]] and [[the Abyss]], but occasionally spawning in the middle-[[Dungeon]]. ==Tips & Tricks== *[[Yredelemnul]] worshipers may receive flaming corpses as pets at high [[piety]]. *If taking them out quickly at range isn't an option, bring high [[fire]] resistance or [[mottled dragon armour]], and [[conservation]] to protect your scrolls. *While they normally avoid [[shallow water]], if you can [[confusion|confuse]] one into falling in, its fire goes out, rendering it [[invisible]] but much less dangerous. ==History== *Flaming corpses were removed in [[0.15]]. *Prior to [[0.8]], flaming corpses had [[:Category:Human_intelligence|human intelligence]]. *Flaming corpses were added in [[0.5]]. They were the first monster with [[:Category:Sticky_flame_resistance|Sticky Flame resistance]]. [[Category:Obsolete monsters]]
